game.name: We Were Here Expeditions: The FriendShip
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Subtitle Options, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 친구와 온라인으로 협동하고 버려진 놀이공원에서 함께 퍼즐을 해결해 우정을 시험해 보세요. 이 독립형 We Were Here 경험에서 협동해 수수께끼를 함께 풀어나가 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Partner up with your friend online and set sail for an unforgettable puzzle adventure in this bite-sized standalone We Were Here experience. Work together to overcome brain-teasing challenges and make fun memories, using your best communication, teamwork and trust skills.
